sentences.en: Everyone here knew of the assistant librarian's passion for handsome boys.
sentences.cn: 每个这里的人都知道助理管理员对英俊男孩的喜好.

sentences.en: He requested help from the librarian to locate the book he wanted.
sentences.cn: 他请求图书管理员帮助找出他要找的书的位置.

sentences.en: He wants the librarian to show him how to use the library.
sentences.cn: 他想请图书管理员教他如何使用图书馆.

sentences.en: I'm a librarian. I work at the University of British Columbia.
sentences.cn: 我是图书管理员. 我在不列颠哥伦比亚大学工作.

sentences.en: Maria finished school, and then became the librarian of the Nantucket Athenaeum.
sentences.cn: 中学毕业后, 玛丽当上了南塔克特学会的图书管理员.

sentences.en: Monica is a librarian at the University of British Columbia.
sentences.cn: 莫尼卡是BC大学的图书管理员.

sentences.en: No reader shall remove a book from the library without consent of the librarian.
sentences.cn: 非经管理员同意,读者不准把书带出图书馆.

sentences.en: The computer can alter the serials librarian and produce a bindery notice.
sentences.cn: 计算机可提醒管理连续出版物的馆员,并制作装订通知.

sentences.en: The librarian catalogues the books we have in the school.
sentences.cn: 图书管理员将学校的书分类编目.

sentences.en: The librarian entered a new book in the catalogue.
sentences.cn: 图书管理员把一本新书编入目录.

sentences.en: The librarian had these new books promptly accessioned.
sentences.cn: 图书馆员迅速地把这些新书登记于图书目录.

sentences.en: The librarian is coding the new books.
sentences.cn: 图书馆员在为新书编号.

sentences.en: The librarian threw back his head and laughed shrilly.
sentences.cn: 图书管理员把头往后面一仰,尖着嗓子哈哈大笑.

sentences.en: The new librarian is a friend of mine.
sentences.cn: 这位新来的图书管理员是我的朋友。

sentences.en: The old librarian illuminated some old books and manuscripts.
sentences.cn: 这个老图书馆员把一些古书和旧抄稿加上各种装饰.

sentences.en: You may deposit your returned books with the librarian.
sentences.cn: 你可以把要还的书留在图书管理员处.

words.tran_cn: 图书馆事业；图书馆管理员职位；图书馆管理业务

trans.tran_en: someone who works in a library
